author: The Editorial Board
title: Magical Thinking in Italy
text:
Italy has had more than 60 governments in 73 years, so the new mooted coalition government of the 5-Star Movement and the League probably won’t last much longer than the others. Then again, Italian financial markets dipped Wednesday with good reason after the plans of this populist left-right coalition were leaked to the press.
The left-wing 5-Star Movement and right-wing League have been trying to form a coalition since March, but talks foundered over the role of former Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi’s Forza Italia party....
